catentdesc.name: Borsati Tall Cliff Fedora
catentdesc.shortdescription: A classic fedora in a rich tan wool felt
catentdesc.longdescription: This raw-edged fedora gives you a distinguished look. A great addition to your fall and winter ensemble. Wipe clean.

catentdesc.name: Leo Classic Straw Hat
catentdesc.shortdescription: A timeless hat for warmer days
catentdesc.longdescription: Find shelter from the sun in this lightweight hat. The chocolate canvas band adds contrast to the warm caramel straw. At just $29, it 's affordable style.

catentdesc.name: Cassetti Soho Black Fedora
catentdesc.shortdescription: A sultry hat in a heavy wool felt
catentdesc.longdescription: Look sharp and mysterious in this classic hat. Features a slightly tapered crown and wide brim. Made of wool felt.

catentdesc.name: Baril Tux Fedora
catentdesc.shortdescription: Old world charm in a durable hat
catentdesc.longdescription: Look distinguished in this traditional fedora with a gutter dent and side-dented crown. Finished with a sewn over welt. Water-resistent.

catentdesc.name: Meso Lasso Fedora
catentdesc.shortdescription: Rugged hat with a flexible custom fit
catentdesc.longdescription: This hat protects you from the elements -- sun, wind, rain -- without compromise. Don 't worry about packing this hat when you travel; it will bounce back into shape in no time. Flexible trim provides a snug fit.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Woven Silk Tie
catentdesc.shortdescription: Wrinkle-free silk tie in eye-catching orange
catentdesc.longdescription: Look suave with this extra-long length tie from Borsati. Made of 100% Italian silk, with diagonal stripes in citrus and orange hues. Dry clean only.

catentdesc.name: Leo Serento Striped Tie
catentdesc.shortdescription: Diagonal stripes add pizzazz to this 100% silk tie
catentdesc.longdescription: This top-quality tie makes a perfect gift for a lucky man in your life. Textured diagonal stripes give this tie a timeless, classic look. Made of 100% silk.

catentdesc.name: Cassetti Lupo Tie
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gorgeous tie featuring squares and diagonal stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: Made from imported silk, this tie is classic and stylish. Patterned with squares and stripes. Dry clean only.

catentdesc.name: Meso Sarto Skinny Tie
catentdesc.shortdescription: The skinny tie makes a comeback
catentdesc.longdescription: Subtle stripes in scarlet hues give this skinny tie its character. Makes a bold statement with any dark-colored suit.

catentdesc.name: Baril Peacock Silk Tie
catentdesc.longdescription: Show of your youthful daring with this bold and beautiful tie from Baril. Accented with diagonal dark brown stripes. Made of 100% Italian silk.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Night Fury Tie
catentdesc.longdescription: This hand-pressed tie has barely discernable stripes that catch the light. This is a versatile tie that complements many different suits and shirts. Made of a silk-polyester blend.

catentdesc.name: Leo Thin Leather Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: A classic black belt for business wear
catentdesc.longdescription: This classic Leo belt is made of soft, supple leather that feels comfortable all day long. Features an antiqued silver buckle. Just $44.

catentdesc.name: Cassetti Split-Plaque Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: A modern-looking belt with clean lines
catentdesc.longdescription: Make of imported Italian leather, this belt has a modern appearance that shows you are a man on the cutting edge of fashion. Features a unique split plaque closure in brushed nickel.

catentdesc.name: Meso Thin Dress Belt
catentdesc.longdescription: You can 't go wrong with this classic belt make of supple tumbled leather. Features a rounded antiqued silver buckle. Perfect for any occasion.

catentdesc.name: Baril Double-edge Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Stylish belt for jeans or chinos
catentdesc.longdescription: This belt features two rows of edge stitching on full-grain Italian leather. Finished with an antiqued silver buckle.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Plaque Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: A wide casual belt with a stylish plaque
catentdesc.longdescription: Made of extra-soft glove leather, this belt offers true quality. The pewter plaque adds a stylish touch. Just the sort of impeccable style you expect from Borsati!

catentdesc.name: Leo Reversible Dress Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: A twistable buckle gives you two belts in one
catentdesc.longdescription: Switch from a black belt to a brown belt with a simple twist of the brushed nickel buckle. This versatile belt goes with any outfit. Made of genuine leather.
